comments:
Hi

I got this NPE because I did not specify the URL on the section "Licence 
Agrement" description in a feature descriptor (URL which is said to 
be "optional" by the way) but I do describe the licenec in the Text area.

FA
Could you please point me to where it says that the url is optional?

Jim, can you comment on the desired behaviour here?  Should it just show the 
provided text if the url is missing, or is this invalid?

Hi

The Optional URL sentence is found in the Information tab of the feature panel 
when you choose the "eature Description".

Regards

FA

The license URL is optional according to the feature.xml spec. The About 
dialog should be tolerant. It should not attempt to show the "click through" 
licence text (which is for use by update manager prior to downloading).

So if it has no URL, the More Info button should be disabled, even if the body 
of the <license> element has text.
Should ensure that the Plugin Details dialog behaves the same.

Created an attachment (id=8286)
patch

I can't find a way to check for a license url without invoking code that
resolves the url, so I didn't change the "More Info" button's enablement.  If
that actually is not a very costly step, or there's another way to check then,
that is likely a better solution.

For now this patch just adds a check before trying to open the url.  If the url
was not specified then an information dialog is opened, which is the same
behaviour as if the feature has no license.

In any case, this patch also integrates the #asLocalUrl changes that were
recently made to the AboutPluginsDialog (see Bug#52585).  The common parent,
ProductInfoDialog has a new method #openBrowser, that extracts the url from a
bundle if needed and then launches the external browser.
